titles.title: GARLIC Act
To address loopholes in the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States that allow companies to avoid the duty rate applicable to dehydrated garlic.
GARLIC Act
Giving Agriculture Relief from Loopholes in International Commerce Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
Giving Agriculture Relief from Loopholes in International Commerce Act or the GARLIC Act
This bill specifies that processed dried garlic and dried garlic mixed with minimal amounts of other vegetables are subject to the higher duty imposed on dried garlic instead of the lower duties imposed on further processed vegetables and other mixed vegetables.
